topics.body:
Lucky Star ep16 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]great, i'll have to get used to the new 7 seconds of the OP won't i 

lol the first couple seconds of the episode is just a zoom-in of Konata's face with her chuckling intensely with this face :3 

learning is fun... but learning is work too, it really just depends 

"doesn't that mean you lack concentration? ...wait, what'd i just say?" ...what was i doing again 

i forget stuff in the microwave too, but not as many times as Miyuki and her mom do 

what's all this "points" stuff btw 

is that cosplay what i think it is >_> 

Konata has a CD... wot 

"you're not seriously trying to sell that are you" 

and now it's Yutaka's turn to take the physical... "oh no, i'm so tiny D:" what were you expecting though XD 

class reunions? oh yeah i'll start having to go to those soon won't i 

oh the weird anime guys again, that never ends well for them does it 

why do these girls know so much about cooki- *flashback to first episode where they literally talk about food for 7 minutes or so* nevermind 

wow so Kagami's friends aren't actually merely background characters, that's nice 

Konata thinks about how she will die... odd topic 

ooh snap time for Akira's concert :P 

...lemme rephrase that, "concert" XD 

she's not bad 

sounds a lot better in the ED though, without that static-y microphone sounding voice[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2/3 of the way through the series, on the final stretch now
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body: My main complaint with it is that the second (And final) episode felt very rushed.

topics.body:
I just had the scare of me lifetime.
[spoiler]I went to Ivy's house. We hung out and all that. Replaying Uncharted 3, watching the telly, etc. The she says she doesn't feel so good. She went to the bathroom then vomited. She looks to me with this scared look. All the while I was thinking exactly 'that'. After a few seconds, she laughs then tells me 'just kidding'.[/spoiler]

I was sweating like crazy, man. That is not something to joke about.
